data.name: Outlaw Tribe Nemesis Expansion
data.detailed_description:
The Outlaw Tribe Nemesis Expansion includes:

• Thousands of NEW Nemesis System enemies, followers & stories
• NEW Orc Weapons, fatalities and brutalities
• NEW Fortress, Outpost and Wilderness gameplay
• NEW Legendary Gear Set for the Bright Lord

The Outlaw Tribe are Mordor's ultimate rebels, defying the domination of the Dark Lord and the Bright Lord alike and fighting for the Age of the Orc. However, when they can be controlled they make fearsome followers and mighty warriors. They wield unique chains to capture their enemies and salvage weapons and armor.

Outlaw Fortresses are filled with warriors who train relentlessly and are among the toughest defenders in Mordor.

data.short_description: The Outlaw Tribe Nemesis Expansion includes: • Thousands of NEW Nemesis System enemies, followers & stories • NEW Orc Weapons, fatalities and brutalities • NEW Fortress, Outpost and Wilderness gameplay • NEW Legendary Gear Set for the Bright Lord
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Arabic, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 with Platform Update
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-2300, 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7870, 2 GB / NVIDIA GTX 660, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Creators Update
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz/ Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480, 4 GB or RX580, 4 GB / NVIDIA GTX 970, 4 GB or GTX1060, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
